  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1591</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Dalai Lama</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dalai Lama</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dalai Lama</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dalai Lama</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dalai Lama</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λάμα Dalai</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dalai Lama</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">a lesson plan on the Dalai Lama’s advice. The learners need to read the advice, understand it,use computer based skills to rearange the advice and then use writing skills to elaborate.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lesson plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">english efl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading skills</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Dalai Lama</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ein Lektionplan auf dem Dalai Lama?s Rat. 
Die Anfänger müssen den Rat lesen, verstehen ihn, verwenden 
rechnergestützte Fähigkeiten zum rearange der Rat und verwenden dann
Schreiben Fähigkeiten, um auszuarbeitn.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">un plan de leçon sur le conseil de 
Dalai Lama. Les étudiants doivent lire le conseil, le 
comprennent, utilisent des qualifications sur ordinateur au rearange 
le conseil et puis emploient des qualifications d'écriture pour 
élaborer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">uma planta da lição no conselho de Dalai 
Lama?s. Os learners necessitam ler o conselho, compreendem o, 
habilidades baseadas computador do uso ao rearange o conselho e usam 
então habilidades da escrita elaborar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">un programma di lezione sul consiglio di Dalai 
Lama?s. I principianti devono leggere il consiglio, lo 
capiscono, usano le abilità computerizzate a rearange il consiglio ed
allora usano le abilità di scrittura per elaborare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ένα σχέδιο μαθήματος για τις συμβουλές Dalai 
Lama?s. Οι αρχάριοι πρέπει να διαβάσουν τις συμβουλές, να
τις καταλάβουν, να χρησιμοποιήσουν τις βασισμένες σε υπολογιστή 
δεξιότητες στο rearange οι συμβουλές και να χρησιμοποιήσουν 
έπειτα τις δεξιότητες σύνταξης εγγράφου που διαμορφώνουν.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">un plan de la lección en el consejo de Dalai 
Lama?s. Los principiantes necesitan leer el consejo, lo 
entienden, utilizan habilidades computarizadas al rearange el consejo 
y después utilizan habilidades de la escritura para elaborar.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektionplan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">englisches efl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lesefähigkeiten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dalai Lama</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">plan de leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">efl anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vocabulaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">qualifications de lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dalai Lama</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
